What is the new behavior?

 The commit message follows Talend standard

 The code coverage on new code >75%
 The new code does not introduce new technical issues (sonar / eslint)

What kind of change does this PR introduce?

 Feature

 Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
 Build / CI related changes

commit.message: feat(TDI-44284):Rename old tEXAxxx connectors in tExasolxxx

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,53 +1,53 @@
-<COMPONENT>
-  <HEADER
-    PLATEFORM="ALL"
-    SERIAL=""
-    VERSION="0.102"
-    STATUS="ALPHA"
-    
-    COMPATIBILITY="ALL"
-    AUTHOR="EXASOL"
-    RELEASE_DATE="20101015A"
-    STARTABLE="true"
-  >
-    <SIGNATURE/>
-  </HEADER>
-
-  <FAMILIES>
-    <FAMILY>Databases/DB Specifics/EXASolution</FAMILY>
-  </FAMILIES>
-
-  <DOCUMENTATION>
-    <URL/>
-  </DOCUMENTATION>
-
-  <CONNECTORS>
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="FLOW" MAX_INPUT="1" MAX_OUTPUT="1"/>
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="ITERATE" MAX_OUTPUT="0" MAX_INPUT="0"/>
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="SUBJOB_OK" MAX_INPUT="1" />
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="SUBJOB_ERROR" MAX_INPUT="1" />
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="COMPONENT_OK"/>
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="COMPONENT_ERROR"/>
-    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="RUN_IF"/>
-  </CONNECTORS>
-
-  <PARAMETERS>
-    <PARAMETER
-      NAME="CONNECTION"
-      FIELD="COMPONENT_LIST"
-      FILTER="tEXAConnection"
-      NUM_ROW="1"
-      DYNAMIC_SETTINGS="true"
-    />
-    <PARAMETER
-      NAME="CLOSE"
-      FIELD="CHECK"
-      NUM_ROW="11"
-    >
-    <DEFAULT>true</DEFAULT>
-    </PARAMETER>
-  </PARAMETERS>
-
-  <CODEGENERATION/>
-  <RETURNS/>
-</COMPONENT>
+<COMPONENT>
+  <HEADER
+    PLATEFORM="ALL"
+    SERIAL=""
+    VERSION="0.102"
+    STATUS="ALPHA"
+    
+    COMPATIBILITY="ALL"
+    AUTHOR="EXASOL"
+    RELEASE_DATE="20101015A"
+    STARTABLE="true"
+  >
+    <SIGNATURE/>
+  </HEADER>
+
+  <FAMILIES>
+    <FAMILY>Databases/DB Specifics/EXASolution</FAMILY>
+  </FAMILIES>
+
+  <DOCUMENTATION>
+    <URL/>
+  </DOCUMENTATION>
+
+  <CONNECTORS>
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="FLOW" MAX_INPUT="1" MAX_OUTPUT="1"/>
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="ITERATE" MAX_OUTPUT="0" MAX_INPUT="0"/>
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="SUBJOB_OK" MAX_INPUT="1" />
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="SUBJOB_ERROR" MAX_INPUT="1" />
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="COMPONENT_OK"/>
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="COMPONENT_ERROR"/>
+    <CONNECTOR CTYPE="RUN_IF"/>
+  </CONNECTORS>
+
+  <PARAMETERS>
+    <PARAMETER
+      NAME="CONNECTION"
+      FIELD="COMPONENT_LIST"
+      FILTER="tDBConnection"

nodes.bodyText: i think we only keep the default properties. and create babili jira to let them rename other language on babili system.
